slide.title: Read preferences
slide.subtitle: (in development)
slide.example:
<?php
$m = new Mongo( 'mongodb://localhost:13000' );
$c = $m->demo->poi;
$c->setReadPreference( Mongo::READ_NEAREST, array( 'dc' => 'europe1' ) );

$c->find( ... );

// or
$c->find( ... )->setReadPreference( Mongo::SECONDARY );
?>
